name: Good Luck Mr. Batto!
description:
GOOD LUCK MR. BATTO is silly adventure demo title for web browsers and the Game Boy.

Play as Mr. Batto as you save the small planet of Nimbus from an upcoming disaster! Meet the inhabitants and work together in this old-school adventure to save the day!

Move: D-Pad/Arrow Keys
Interact: A/Z

This game was made using GB Studio.
